entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bonavista
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:23 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bonavista 11:30 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023
Temperature: 2.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 91 %
Dewpoint: 1.0°C
Wind: WSW 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries or rain showers ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the morning then steady.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the morning then steady. Wind chill minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with ice pellets. Snow and ice pellet amount possibly more than 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of freezing rain or snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain or snow. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023
